fullplot: New York working girl Susan Applegate is desperate to go home to Iowa but does not have the railway fare so she disguises herself as a child to ride half fare. Enroute she meets Philip Kirby, an Army major teaching at a military school.
plot: A woman disguises herself as a child to save on a train fare and is taken in charge by an army man who doesn't notice the truth.
title: The Major and the Minor
writers: Edward Childs Carpenter (suggested by a play by)
